title: Comigo
description: Comigo combines therapeutic support with practical execution for ADHD. Built by a team including two PhDs and a former a16z-funded AI startup CTO, we help you start your day by identifying and completing your ONE THING—what you'd be most disappointed not finishing. Through guided conversations, we explore why this task matters and how completing it will make you feel. Our brain dump feature gets overwhelming thoughts out of your head, reducing anxiety and helping you focus on what truly matters.
